metadata.description:
"After" is a glimpse in to the combination of sound experimentation and songwriting that is so integral to Koastle. It pushes the boundaries of our sound design in tandem with a powerful hook that delivers an emotional experience filled with both excitement and somberness - a raw collection of feelings left open to interpretation. 

"After" is the first edition of our new project called Koastcards. Each month we will be traveling to a new location to present 4 new releases that will drop each week: 

Week 1: Electric Oyster (Mix Series) 
Week 2: EDM song 
Week 3: a remix 
Week 4: pop song

Koastcards is a check-in with all of our fans, to catch them up on our travels, our releases and our journey - an invitation to come alongside us in experiencing the good times we haven't had yet. 

For this first episode of Koastcards we are traveling to San Onofre, CA - a staple in Southern California for its remote surf beaches and untouched coastal landscape. This marks a perfect spot for us to debut this new project debuting officially in January 2023.

lyrics.text:
Verse 1: 
Hope,
is not as strong a you think 
But in power it can light the way 
kind of things wont seem to go away 

Chorus: 
Can you help me feel?
said, can you help me feel? 
cause in darkness you illuminate 
Can you help me feel?
Can you help me

metadata.name: After #1
metadata.title: After
